title: Manage Distribution of Dailies
description: An agent needs to process the raw footage from a day's shoot (dailies) and make it securely available for review by the director and producers.

tasks.description: Ingest the raw footage from the camera cards into the asset management system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully transfers all footage from the day's shoot.

tasks.description: Transcode the high-resolution raw footage into low-resolution proxy files for easy streaming.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent initiates and completes the transcoding process for all clips.

tasks.description: Upload the proxy files to a secure online viewing platform.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully uploads all proxy files.

tasks.description: Grant access to the director and producers and send them a notification with the viewing link.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly sets permissions and sends the notification.
